name: A Smoking Gun: A Charles Valentine Detective Story
name_original: A Smoking Gun: A Charles Valentine Detective Story
description:
In this game set in 1920s Portland, Maine, you must solve the disappearance of a man and solve the mystery lurking in this town. Interview suspects, find clues, and piece together your findings to bring the perpetrator to light. Will you catch whoever is responsible, or will you let them escape justice? The fate of the town lies in your hands...

Available for Windows and Mac

V1.0.2 now available.
